item.title: Ancient spear-throwing tool brings fun and history to Vermont competition
item.description: A few dozen enthusiasts of ancient hunting tools participated in the Northeast Open Atlatl Championship in Addison, Vermont

item.title: New Hampshire police say multiple gunshot victims at country club. 1 suspect in custody
item.description: Police in New Hampshire say a shooting at a country club has left multiple gunshot victims

item.title: Trump says he will award the Presidential Medal of Freedom to Ben Carson
item.description: President Donald Trump has announced he will award Ben Carson the Presidential Medal of Freedom

item.title: Trump nominates White House aide to be top US prosecutor for office probing Letitia James
item.description: President Donald Trump has announced his nomination of Lindsey Halligan as the top federal prosecutor for the Eastern District of Virginia

item.title: Pentagon steps up media restrictions, now requiring approval before reporting even unclassified info
item.description: The Pentagon is stepping up restrictions on the media by requiring journalists to sign a pledge not to report on information that has not been authori...
